profile_description: View your LoL stats, achievements, and profile details.
profile_stats_description: Check your overall performance, KDA, win rate, and more.
match_history_description: See a detailed breakdown of your recent matches.
favorite_champions_description: Find your most played and favorite champions here.
champions_description: Explore detailed statistics and comparisons for all champions.
matches_description: Analyze your matches and view opponent and team stats.
team_analysis_description: Evaluate team compositions and team synergy.
leaderboard_description: See the top players on the server and your ranking.
settings_description: Manage your language, theme, and other personal settings.
about_app_description: Analyze your League of Legends stats and track your progress with this app.
faq_description: Find answers to frequently asked questions.
support_description: Get help and assistance for any issues.
contact_description: Get in touch with the development team.
privacy_policy_description: Learn how your user data is protected.
terms_of_service_description: Read the terms and conditions for using the app.
search_placeholder: Type the summoner name and tag to search (e.g., demir#433) and press Enter.
footer_desc: Nexrito is a comprehensive analytics and statistics platform for League of Legends. Analyze your opponents, discover top champions, and stay ahead in the game.
